thread.section_title: Elevate Styles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Elevate Styles | elevatestyles.com
thread.title: Iyea B
thread.title_full: Elevate Styles reviewed by Iyea B

author: Iyea B
title: Iyea B
text: I orderd from elevate styles after reviewing their selections and checking customer feedback. Some of the hair I have bought was more expensive in other stores but much cheaper on the site. I was amazed at the quick turn around and customer service. I recieved an email confirmation and my order within a few days. I can't wait to install. I will be coming back and sharing with my friends.
